channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Supersavers who can put $72,000 in their 401(k)s in 2026 should make this smart ‘mega’ Roth move
item.description: “This is a strategy that is so incredibly beneficial for highly compensated employees because they can’t contribute to a regular Roth IRA.”

item.title: Can popular diabetes and weight-loss drugs slow vascular dementia?
item.description: Can GLP-1s treat vascular dementia? One study failed, but some researchers are holding out hope.

item.title: Bitcoin is in a bear market — and it’s still overvalued by almost 40%
item.description: The cryptocurrency’s fair value is around $53,000, according to this calculation.

item.title: I’m 59. Does it make financial sense to dip into my $2.5 million IRA to buy a $400K home?
item.description: “I regret not buying a home 10 years ago, but we were both going through divorces.”

item.title: Bulls aren’t going to like this new stock-market valuation model
item.description: Stocks are expensive regardless of whether you take a top-down or bottom-up approach

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
